pullRequest.title: docs: add usage docs for Java client describeSource()
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
^ as the title says. New feature in 0.12.0 so this PR does not need to be cherry-picked.
Testing done
Docs-only change.
Reviewer checklist

 Ensure docs are updated if necessary. (eg. if a user visible feature is being added or changed).
 Ensure relevant issues are linked (description should include text like "Fixes #")

commit.message: docs: add usage docs for Java client describeSource()

nodes.bodyText: Maybe use ## instead of --------, just for consistency with the ### headings.
nodes.diffHunk: @@ -643,6 +644,30 @@ for (QueryInfo query : queries) { } ``` +See the [API reference](https://docs.ksqldb.io/en/latest/developer-guide/ksqldb-clients/java-client/api/io/confluent/ksql/api/client/Client.html) +for more information. + +Describe specific streams and tables +------------------------------------------------------------------------
